title: Rates with water in cone and cylinder part - c

content.question: Let y be the depth, in feet, of the water in the cylindrical tank. At what rate is y changing when ? Indicate units of measure. <math> <mrow> <mi> h </mi> <mo> = </mo> <mn> 3 </mn> </mrow> </math>
